Description:
Vendor Must Sell - Make An Offer
Located in one of the North's upcoming locations, this vacant block of land measuring 231m2 in the Kallo estate provides easy access to the Hume Freeway and walking distance to Donnybrook Train Station. Just a quick stroll to the future Kallo Town Centre and planned Primary School and Community Centre, this land could make the perfect new home site for you. Come and join an exciting new community in Melbourne's north that will offer your family a world of choice. This really is a great opportunity not to be missed!!
Photo ID Required Upon Inspection
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.
219-221 High Street Thomastown 3074
767 High Street Epping 3076
510 Plenty Road Mill Park 3082
952-954 High Street Reservoir 3073
http://rata.harcourts.com.au/Home/statement-of-information
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.
This document has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies.
Accordingly all interested parties should make their own enquiries to verify the information.

Description:
Titled Land 700 SQM For Sale In Kalkallo
Rectangular Big Block 700 Sqm Situated within a stone's throw to Donnybrook Station and located in the ever-popular Cloverton estate in Kalkallo. It is titled and ready to build your dream home with 20 metre big frontage x 32 metre length.
This 700 m2 (approx.) parcel of land offers the perfect opportunity to build your dream home for you and your family, Surrounded by an abundance of open space, parks, walkways and wetlands connecting to Merri Creek and just a short drive to the Hume Hwy with only a 40 minute drive to the CBD. You will also be close to the Donnybrook train station as well as the future Town Centre.
Don't miss out on this golden opportunity.
Please Call Vijeth Shetty 0432 407 840 or Ani Parasher 0458
161 973

Description:
Premium rectangular 400 sqm block of Land located in Prestige Drive -- Titled Land
Do you want to build your dream house in Prestige Drive in the largest estate in Victoria?
Cloverton Estate is going to be the largest residential community in Victoria and one of the biggest estates in Australia which includes a City Center, Hospital, University, Entertainment facilities,
Employment district and a new train station
• Premium rectangular 400 sqm block of Land
• Located in Prestige Drive in Cloverton estate
• North facing block of land (perfect sunlight)
• No slope (no additional site cost)
• 38km from Melbourne CBD
• Very close to Donnybrook train station
• Walking distance to park and playground
• Walking distance to future shopping centre, university and train station
• Unique view of a row of beautiful mature pine trees across the road from this block

Description:
Calling all first home buyers & investors!
Situated in the most popular Cloverton Estate is this stunning family home which is ready for you to simply move in and enjoy. Comprising of 4 bedrooms (en suite to main), central open plan kitchen/meals/family looking out to landscaped backyard. Easy access to the Hume Freeway and close to the Donnybrook train station, local parkland, sporting ovals, the Kalkallo Hotel & future local shops and schooling this property is one not to miss for the first home buyer or investor.
Featuring:
- 4 Bedrooms with BIR's - (ensuite to main)
- Double garage (remote and internal access)
- Front and rear landscaping
- Stone benchtop
- Stainless steel appliances
- Gas ducted heating
- Down-lights
PHOTO ARE FOR ILLUSTRATION PURPOSE ONLY

Description:
Brand New Home!!!!
A home to meet the requirements of you and your family. Positioned in a prime location in Kalkallo and within reach of parklands and future proposed facilities, as well as within close proximity to Hume Hwy. This beautiful 4-bedroom home offers ample internal space.
Master suite with huge walk in robe, exquisite Ensuite with vanities and bathtub, floor to ceiling quality tiles throughout, remaining three generous size bedrooms feature spacious robes.
Beautiful fully equipped kitchen with quality 900mm stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, an abundance of cupboard and bench space with lot of cabinets. Beautiful kitchen also includes Butler's Pantry, Bulk head with Led lights.
Large open plan family living area with modern Blinds and downlight throughout, and Dining area completing the picture is a great size tiled alfresco area with down lights. where you will be able to spend wonderful family time together.
Additionally, there is a massive laundry with ample storage and overhead cupboard space, powder room and a stunning main bathroom. Outside you will be welcomed by a beautifully fully covered and landscaped surrounds, creating the ultimate outdoor area for the family to enjoy all year around.
Extras include - cooling, ducted heating, high ceilings, alarm, intercom, stone benchtops, quality built-in cabinetry, internal accessed remote controlled double garage and much more!
Features: Walk in Pantry, Powder Room, Double garage, concrete around the house, Designer inclusions and much more.

Description:
Sensational entertainer on 512M2 offering family style living
An opportunity exists to acquire this sprawling 30 square (approx) home that offers multiple zoned living areas with bright open plan living spaces. From the moment you walk in to the home you are greeted by the wide entry hall and high ceilings giving a lovely spacious feel. The magnificent kitchen with 900 mm stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, stone bench tops and a walk in pantry is a cooks delight and certainly a show piece of this fabulous home as it overlooks the spacious family room out to the under roof line alfresco area. Add to this 4 large bedrooms with BIR's and master with ensuite and walk in robes. Two large bathrooms, formal lounge, family room, theatre room, kids retreat / multi media room, and double garage with internal access, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm system, colorbond fencing, quality floor coverings and blinds and a large back yard complete the home. Situated in the popular fast growing Cloverton estate this home is an opportunity not to be missed. Must be sold! Enquire today!

Description:
Prestige Display Home With Location To Suit
Be welcomed by this impressive classic facade & fastidiously manicured garden & be graced by the homes impressive interior that flaunts a touch of class, style & captivating spaces.
Comprising of 4 bedrooms (colossal master with large walk in robe & double vanity en-suite), study which makes for the perfect home office, designer equipped kitchen with 900ml stainless steel appliances, walk in pantry dishwasher, build in microwave & an abundance of storage space overlooking a large family & meals area accompanied by an extravagant alfresco area with fire place making this the perfect area to entertain family & friends all year round.
Journey on through the home to a separate formal lounge or theatre room offering plenty of options for the growing family. Adding to this is a sparkling main bathroom, powder room, roomy laundry, oversized double remote garage with internal access, high ceilings & doors, refrigerated cooling, ducted heating, zoned alarm system and perfectly manicured gardens.
Add this home to your inspection list as inspections will not disappoint. Set in a tree lined street and located close to Parks & playgrounds, quality sports facilities, primary & secondary schools, as well as retail/cafe precincts highlight the scope of Cloverton's impressive master plan, along with easy access to Donnybrook Station & the Hume Freeway. All this just 40 kilometres from the heart of Melbourne - don't miss this one!

Description:
QUALITY BUILD FAMILY HOME
This newly built stunning house on 413 sqm land is equipped with everything you need for your growing family needs.
Positioned in the thriving KALKALLO - this spacious home includes a formal lounge room, large open plan dining/ living area, double car garage, four generous bedrooms, two bathrooms, including a master Ensuite & walk in robe.
Kitchen is equipped with 900mm stainless steel appliances, stone bench top, dishwasher and walk in pantry.
Offering impressive extra's such as ducted heating, large laundry including- in built linen cupboard, high ceilings, alfresco and front landscaping.
With close proximity to the Hume freeway, Donnybrook train station , private schools and the proposed state primary school this home definitely has everything you are looking for and more.
For further information contact me at 0425642583 or to book a private inspection.

Description:
Style, Class and Sophistication
Capital & Co. real Estate are delighted to bring to you this astounding home humbly located in the heart of Cloverton Estate . This amazing home has been exquisitely fashioned with quality fittings and attention to every detail all perfectly bound together presenting the picture-perfect family home ready to move into.
Built on a generous land size of 475m2 (approx.) and impeccably presented interiors offer abundance of natural light with spacious open plan living/dining. Further complimented by a very sleek and open kitchen area highly equipped with 900mm stainless steel appliances.
This home offers spacious master bedroom complete with a walk in wardrobe and en-suite. Three additional bedrooms with two accompanied with built in robes and a generous sized central bathroom.
Step outside onto a beautifully great size landscaped garden and enough space to entertain family/friends throughout the year.
Extra features include-
- Kitchen with Caesar bench tops and stainless steel appliances
--High ceilings
- Double garage with eternal excess
- Ducted heating
- Evaporative cooling

Description:
Contact CRAIG FROST 0413 018 033 to organise a PRIVATE INSPECTION at a time that suits you.
Living made easy on landscaped surrounds (539sqm approx).
Surrounded by fully landscaped gardens is this near new, boutique built, four bedroom home with ensuite and bathroom, two living areas, separate dining, double lock up garage and covered outdoor entertaining area. Neutral colour tones, quality fittings, high ceilings and large open spaces make this the perfect purchase for the first home buyer, down sizer, investor or young family.
Enter through the front door to a wide entry hallway that evokes a feeling of spaciousness which continues throughout the house and particularly within the large open living, kitchen and dining area. Open and bright, this space leads out through two separate stacker sliding doors onto a large outdoor covered timber deck, the ideal location for entertaining and relaxing with family and friends.
The galley style kitchen features full length breakfast bar, walk in pantry, subway tiled splash back, generous fridge space and stainless steel appliances including Westinghouse free standing 900mm oven/cooktop, range hood and dishwasher.
A second living room is located off the main entrance hallway, is carpeted and well positioned to be used as a formal sitting room, media zone or children's play room.
The main bedroom with walk in robe is located at the front of the house with its own ensuite including double sink vanity, generous shower and separate toilet. Three additional bedrooms, each with sliding robes are located in a separate wing toward the back of the house sharing a family bathroom including shower, basin, bath and separate toilet.
Additional features include; ducted ceiling heating, split system heating cooling, separate laundry with external access, garden shed, clothes line, concrete pathways, double lock up gates to the rear/side of the back yard along with trailer storage area.
"Cloverton will become a centre of education north of Melbourne - with childcare, schools and tertiary facilities all proposed for the area. A major retail centre is being planned, while public transport and medical services will provide everything the community needs."
"Minutes from the existing Donnybrook Train Station and the future Train Station, access to the Melbourne CBD will be quick and easy. For drivers, a future interchange with the Hume Freeway will make transport even easier."
A note to buyers
We base our price ranges on comparable sales within the area and current market conditions. We do not over quote property to vendors or underquote property to buyers. We recognise that the final sale price will ultimately be influenced by competition within the market and that the advertised selling range is not a ceiling to the price buyers may be willing to pay to secure the purchase of the property.
Frost Real Estate is pleased to be able to offer our buyers complete dedication to your discrete purchasing experience. Every interested buyer is invited to put their best offer forward for the property with the knowledge that offers will not be disclosed between buyers.
At the heart of Frost Real Estate is a passion for helping people purchase and sell property. We hope that this information helps you with your property search.
Please contact Craig Frost on 0413 018 033 to arrange a private inspection.
While every effort has been made to provide the correct description of the property and identify the properties features, we advise you to conduct an inspection of the property for yourself.

Description:
Create Your Very Own Future in Cloverton
This is where the dream begins! Fully-titled, this generous allotment provides the perfect place to build your brand-new home with its uniform proportions, minimal gradient & prime location in the heart of popular Cloverton Estate.
Approximately 392 square metres in total (14m frontage x 28m depth), the block offers all the space required to bring the design of your dreams to reality.
You'll also enjoy the benefits of Cloverton's Green Star development principles ensuring every property is designed and built to a 6-star energy standard - saving on your fuel bills, minimizing your environmental footprint & creating a healthier environment for the entire community.
Adding to its appeal, this premier location will offer immediate access to the best of Cloverton's masterplan amenities including expansive parklands & Merri Creek conservation area, a range of sports facilities, retail & dining precincts, as well as future primary & secondary schools & proposed train station.
An outstanding lifestyle/investment opportunity in the north's thriving growth corridor, it also provides easy access to Donnybrook Station & the Hume Freeway.
